definition[0]: the small dark circular part of a woman’s breast. Babies suck milk through their mother’s nipples.
definition[1]: one of the two small dark circular parts on a man’s chest
definition[2]: the rubber part on a baby’s bottle that a baby sucks milk through
definition[3]: a part in an engine or machine made of rubber or plastic and shaped like a nipple. It has a hole in it which liquid can flow or be poured through.
